channel.title: What's BitHalo's relation to BitBay
channel.description:
Seems BitHalo is also done by David Zimbeck.
Is BitHalo a protocol that BitHalo the marketplace and BitBay the marketplace both implements?

item.title: What's BitHalo's relation to BitBay
item.dc:creator: @Mantrack
item.description:
@Mantrack wrote:

David is now fully committed to Bitbay so all the innovations will solely go to Bitbay!

Read full topic

item.title: What's BitHalo's relation to BitBay
item.dc:creator: @lulalala Lulalala
item.description:
@lulalala wrote:

Thanks. Does it mean David will put more resources here than BitHalo and BlackHalo, or the three of them will share some developments?

Read full topic

item.title: What's BitHalo's relation to BitBay
item.dc:creator: @Mantrack
item.description:
@Mantrack wrote:

Bithalo is the name of the peer to peer technology that David Zimbeck created. He initially did it for Bitcoin but now it is done for Bitbay because Bitbay as a crypto-currency is far better than Bitcoin as it uses Proof of Stake 3.0 while Bitcoin is using Proof of Work and also Bitbay will benefit from a dynamic peg which will bring stability to the price!

Read full topic
